title: Edelweiss Housing Finance ties up with SBI for co-lending in priority sector home loans - Economic Times
content: Edelweiss Housing Finance ties up with SBI for co-lending in priority sector home loans  Economic Times
description: For EHFL, co-lending represents an alternate model of disbursals that is asset-light and creates a sound revenue model for sustainable business, whereas for SBI - which brings capital flows at lower costs - the partnership provides wider customer reach.
